title: DeFi/CeFi Cardano&...TBC in Fund 7
description: How can we create an environment for seamless (no extra fee/delay) integration b/w ADA and FIAT?
importance: For Cardano to become a World FinOS, the integration b/w ADA and FIAT must be seamless.
success: Wide user adoption of ADA, Spending ADA at stores, broader audience served.
